_header: Saint Juliana come of high men as we find I-writ
Subjects: saints’ lives; Juliana, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Juliana in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Iulian com of heie men as we fyndeþ writeCristene
                    stilliche he bicom þat nomon ne scholde iwite…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…þo hadde he is owe dom þat he wolde Te maide
                    scendeþus seynt Iulian þe holi maide hir lif broȝte to
                    ende
BodAsh43.Editions:
Cockayne,  Thomas Oswald,  and  Edmund Brock, eds.  
             Þe Liflade of St. Juliana
EETS
         o.s. 51 (1872): 81-7.
Schleich,  Gustav. 
             “Die Gloucestershire-Legende der heiligen Juliane.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         151 (1927): 19-51: 25-34.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Iuliane com of heiȝe men as we fyndeþ i
                    writeCristene stilleliche heo bicom þat no mon scholde hit
                    wite…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now seinte Iuliane þe holy Mayden we biddeþ þe atte
                    endeBidde for vs þat we mote to þe Ioye of heuene weende.
                    Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Iuliane was comen of hey kyn as we fyndeCristene stillich heo
                    bicom þat noman sholde wite…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…þo had he is owne dom þat he wolde þe maide
                    shendeþus seint Iuliane þe holi maide brouhte hire lif to
                    ende
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint Iulian was comen of hiȝe men as we finde I writeCristen
                    stille sche be com þat no man schulde it wite…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…Þo hadde he his owen dom þat he wolde with þe maide
                    schendeÞus seint Iulian þe holy maide hire liif broughte to
                    þe ende

[S]einte Iuliane com of heyȝe men as we findeþ
                    iwritStilleliche ȝe cristene bicom þat noman hit scholde
                    wy[t]…
OxfCCC431.Last Lines:
…þo hadde he his o[ ]om for h[ ] sche[ ]þus S
                    Iuliane þe holy [ ] to ende

CULAdd3039.Transcription:
Sayne Julyan com of hethen men als story witnes it& priuely
                    cristen sho become þat no man sulde it wit…
CULAdd3039.Note: Lines 1-2 only due to loss of folio(s).

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein Iulian com of heie men as me findeþ iwriteCristene
                    stilleliche heo bicom þat no man ne ssolde iwite…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Þo hadde he is owedom þat he wolde þe maide
                    ssendeus sein Iulian þe holy maide hure lif broȝte to
                    ende
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Juliane com of heye men as me ffyndeþ of hure
                    ywriteCristene ȝeo by com stilleliche þat no man hit sholde
                    ywite…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Þo hadde he his owe dom þat he wolde hure
                    shendeÞus Seint Juliane þe holy mayde hure lif brouȝte to
                    ende

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint Iuliane com of hey kune as we fyndeþ y wrytecristyne heo
                    by com stylleliche þat no man schould hit wyte…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Þo hadde he hys owne dom þat he wolde þat mayde
                    schendeþus seint Iuliane þe mayde broȝt hure lyf to
                    ende

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEyn Iulian com of heye men as me findiþ y wryteCristine
                    fulleche ȝo by com þat no man ne ssolde y wyte…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Þo hadde he is owne dom þat he wolde þe mayde
                    ssendeþus sein Iulian þe holy mayde hure lyf broȝte to
                    ende
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De sancta Iuliana (f. 31, by scribe in margin beside first line);
                        Iulian (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint Iuliane come of heie men as we findeþ ywriteCristene stilleliche heo bicom þat noman ne scholþe ywyte…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …þo hadde he his owe dom þat he wolþe þe mai schendeþus sein Iulian þe holi man here lif broȝte to ende
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xvi” added to right margin by later hand (f. 27).

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Iuliane com of heiȝ kun as we findeþ iwriteCristene heo bicom þat no mon scholde it wite…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Þo hedde he is oune dom þat he wolde þe maide schendeÞus seint Iulian þe maide brouȝte hire lif to ende

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEynt Iuliana com of heye men as we vindir iwreteCristyn stilliche ȝe by com þat noman sscholde ywite…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Nou Ihesus vor þe mochil pyne þat seynt Iuliana þolid hereGraunte ous vor hire loue of þe pyne of helle be schere

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEin Iulian com of heie men as me findeþ iwriteCristene stilleliche heo bicom þat noman ne ssolde iwite…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …Þo hadde he is owe dom þat he wolde þe maide schendeþus sein Iulyan þe holy mayde hure lyf broȝte to ende
BLEge2891.Attributed Title: De sancta Iuliana virgine (rubric in margin, f. 15v)

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Iulian come of gode men as we hit fynde writenAnd cristned
                    she was fully þat lyte in lond þer wisten…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Now pray we to Ihesu Crist þat all has made of
                    noȝtÞat we may to þat blis come þer saynt Iulyan was
                    broȝt Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seint Ieliane come of hethen men as we fynde writeCristen stilly
                    she bicome þat no man shulde wite…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…And so seint Ielian þe virgyne brouȝt her lyf to
                    endeGod ȝeue vs grace for her loue to heuene forto wende.
                    Amen.
